title: How The Pandemic Has Changed Worship In America And The Debate Over Religious Freedom
description: Two Easters have now come and gone since the pandemic began, and the need for restrictions has not gone away. It has faith communities wondering when things will get back to normal. NPR's Lee Hale reports on how faith leaders have approached worship differently since the pandemic began.
